name: Don't Die Alone
description:
After receiving an unremarkable spam message, an outcasted teen's friend count becomes the difference between life or death.

Note: This game uses a lot of sound effects so make sure to play with sound!

This game features:

12 CGs (With multiple variations for many of them!),

An immersive short story,

A unique monster,

An in universe social media with 50+ fictional accounts,

And more!

Content Warnings
  • Mentions of bullying
  • Light gore
  • Death
  • Occasional swearing

Credits

Writing, artwork, music, and programming done by StephenW313
